ygData.subject: Re: Arcane Order Cap quest question
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve had the same prob with one of my Char & have spent weeks on this thing & nothing??? I wish someone would answer because I would like to know about this
ygData.messageBody:
I've had the same prob with one of my Char & have spent weeks on this
thing & nothing??? I wish someone would answer because I would like
to know about this myself:(

Mari

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., azurezen <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> I'm trying to do the Arcane Order Cap quest that starts in the
> Enchanter/Mage/Wizard guild in S. Qeynos.
>
> http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/quest.html?quest=1966
>
> Has anyone here done this quest?
>
> I've killed a bunch of Rabid Wolves and I haven't gotten a single
> Rabid Wolf Hide. I always get Diseased Wolf Pelts. When I try to
> combine one of the pelts with the other stuff for the cap it says I
> cannot combine them in an object of that type :(
> Do Rabid Wolves actually drop Rabid Wolf Hides in Qeynos Hills? If
> they do, do they do it on the Quellious server?
